title: Deposit Crypto

service-deposit.title: Deposit {{coin}} to Invest in this Service
service-deposit.description: The trader of this service is trading with {{coin}}, so you must deposit the same crypto the trader is using in order to share profits with them. Please deposit {{coin}} to your account.

service-swap.title: Deposit {{coin}} to Invest with Trader
service-swap.description: The trader is trading with {{coin}}, so you must deposit the same crypto the trader is using in order to share profits with them. Please deposit {{coin}} to your account or convert other coins to {{ coin }}.

description: Deposit Crypto in your Zignaly Account. Zignaly is an official <0>Binance Broker</0>. Your funds will be safe on Binance. <1>More info</1>.
no-network: The wallet is currently undergoing maintenance. Your funds in transit are safe once confirmed on the blockchain and will be credited shortly after deposits have resumed.

depositAddress.placeholder: Choose the currency and the network first.
